item.title: Power BI Developer  - Upwork
item.description:
Role - Power BI Developer
Experience Required - 3 to 5 Years
Location - Remote

Immediate joiners are preferred.

Your Mission

We are looking for a Power BI developer responsible to transform raw data into relevant insights via interactive

and simple-to-understand dashboards and reports. The role will require translating complex data models into actionable data points/ visualization to drive key decision making

What you'll do

As a part of the Professional Services reporting team you will:

Understand business requirements to set functional specifications for reporting applications
Utilize Power BI to build interactive and visually appealing dashboards and reports. Analyze pervious and
present data for better decision making

Be experienced in tools and systems on MS SQL Server BI Stack, including SSRS and TSQL, Power Query,
MDX, PowerBI, and DAX. Perform detailed analysis on tested and deployed Power BI scripts

Have knowledge of database fundamentals such as multidimensional database design, relational database design, and more
Study, analyze and understand business requirements in context to business intelligence.
Design and map data models to shift raw data into meaningful insights.
Identify the requirements and develop custom charts accordingly
Transform business requirements into technical publications
Perform detailed analysis on tested and deployed Power BI scripts
Run DAX queries and functions in Power BI
What you'll bring to the team

Autonomous working style with prior experience in driving a team
Proven experience as a BI Developer, building out Power BI Visualizations (preferably with experience connecting to Salesforce)
Industry experience is preferred
Background in data warehouse design (e.g. dimensional modeling) and data mining
In-depth understanding of database management systems, online analytical processing (OLAP) and ETL
(Extract, transform, load) framework

Knowledge of SQL queries, SQL Server Reporting Services (SSRS) and SQL Server Integration Services (SSIS)
Proven abilities to take initiative and be innovative
Analytical mind with a problem-solving aptitude
BSc/BA in Computer Science, Engineering or relevant field
Excellent communication skills.
Experience in gathering requirements from multiple stakeholders identify and understand business needs and converting these into Technical specification, Data Model and ETL design.
Experience working for a Professional Services organization previously is a plus
An understanding of project management planning techniques.

Budget: $1,200
Posted On: July 05, 2024 08:54 UTC
Category: Data Visualization
Skills:Power Query, Microsoft Power BI, SQL, Business Intelligence, Microsoft Power BI Development, Microsoft Power BI Data Visualization, Data Visualization, Data Modeling, Data Analysis
Skills: Power Query, Microsoft Power BI, SQL, Business Intelligence, Microsoft Power BI Development, Microsoft Power BI Data Visualization, Data Visualization, Data Modeling, Data Analysis

item.title: Machine Learning Engineer - Tiger Graph Experience! - Upwork
item.description:
The immediate business needs we have:
- To improve product recommendations using TigerGraph (or similar tools/options) and our surrounding EcoSystem.
- Have short iterative sprints to experiment and test
- Work with key stakeholders that are non-technical and be able to break complex problems to easy-to-understand speak
- Work with other partners (internal and external) to increase/improve the datapoints that we utilise to make predictions and recommendations

If interested in what this opportunity could look like moving to full-time, the below is a more complete job spec:

Responsibilities:
- Design and develop machine learning algorithms, deep learning applications, and systems.
- Construct optimized data pipelines to feed machine learning models.
- Collaborate with product teams to define and refine machine learning projects that align with business goals.
- Develop and maintain scalable and robust machine learning models to drive user engagement and satisfaction.
- Utilize a variety of datasets to train and validate models, ensuring accuracy and efficiency in real-world applications.
Implement advanced machine learning techniques, including supervised and unsupervised learning, deep learning, and anomaly detection.
- Optimize and troubleshoot the current recommendation system built on a graph database, ensuring it operates effectively and efficiently.
- Ensure seamless integration and data consistency between internal systems and the graph database.
- Work with the engineering team to deploy models into production, ensuring they operate at scale and with high reliability.
- Develop and implement monitoring tools and alerts for production models.
- Continuously evaluate and iterate on models based on performance metrics and feedback from users and stakeholders.
- Analyze data to extract insights and build data visualizations to support business intelligence and decision-making.
- Utilize data visualization libraries and BI tools to create dashboards and reports for various stakeholders.
- Collaborate with UX/UI teams to ensure machine learning features enhance user experience.
- Stay updated with the latest trends and advancements in AI and machine learning to bring innovation and improvements to our solutions.
- Work in short sprints on a POC/MVP basis and iterate models over time.

Qualifications/Skills:
- Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Data Science, or a related technical field.
- Proven experience in machine learning, data science, or a similar role.
- Strong proficiency in programming languages such as Python and frameworks/libraries like TensorFlow, PyTorch, and Scikit-Learn.
- Experience with graph databases, particularly TigerGraph, or a willingness to learn and adapt to it quickly.
- Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Google Cloud, Azure) and understanding of deploying applications at scale.
- Experience in integrating and ensuring data consistency between multiple systems.
- Experience working with UX/UI teams to implement machine learning features that enhance user experience.
- Strong analytical skills with the ability to collect, organize, analyze, and disseminate significant amounts of information with attention to detail and accuracy.
- Proven experience in developing monitoring tools and setting up alerts for production models.
- Ability to analyze complex data sets and provide actionable insights through data visualizations.
- Strong skills in data visualization tools and techniques, with experience using BI tools such as Tableau, Power BI, or Looker to create dashboards and visual reports.
- Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to work in a fast-paced, startup environment.
- Extensive math and computer skills, with a deep understanding of probability, statistics, and algorithms.
- Familiarity with data structures, data modeling, and software architecture.
- Effective communication skills, both written and verbal, to collaborate with cross-functional teams.

Hourly Range: $32.00-$70.00
Posted On: July 05, 2024 06:04 UTC
Category: Machine Learning
Skills:Python, Machine Learning, Data Science, TensorFlow, Deep Learning
Skills: Python, Machine Learning, Data Science, TensorFlow, Deep Learning
Country: United Arab Emirates
click to apply

item.title: Seeking a Power BI expert to construct a dashboard linked to two live data sources. - Upwork
item.description:
We are in search of a specialist skilled in Microsoft Power BI to create a dashboard that will report on our client's IT helpdesk metrics. We need an expert who can advise us on the best practices for establishing Power BI dashboards.

Project Overview:

The dashboard should consist of one or two pages and must be exportable to PDF for inclusion in larger monthly reports. It will draw data from two sources:

Syncro RMM - https://community.syncromsp.com/t/power-bi/12173 & https://community.syncromsp.com/t/database-exports/12175
HaloPSA - https://halopsa.com/integrations/power-bi-psa-integration/

Ideally the data displayed is no more than 24 hrs old, even better if it's live data.

The dashboard should include the following metrics, displayed as gauges or tiles that can be moved around to suit different layouts:

Asset & Device Metrics:
Total device counts of PCs, servers, and other network devices.
Breakdown of workstations by their age.
Percentage of workstations covered by warranty and not.
Percentage of devices with antivirus installed.
Percentage of devices that are fully patched.
A list of firewalls with model numbers and operating system versions.
Total number of alerts detected and total number resolved in the last 12 months.
Total number of alerts detected and total number resolved in the last 30 days months.

Support and Ticket Metrics:
Total number of new tickets lodged and total number tickets resolved in last 12 months.
Total number of new tickets lodged and total number tickets resolved in last 30 days.
Average customer satisfaction last 12 months.
A pie chart of ticket categories logged in the last 30 days and 12 months.

Other Requirements:

- The connection of data must be secure.
- The dashboard must be easily filterable by client name.
- Ideally, we can drill down into data formatted as a list when clicking on one of the above "tiles".
- We need the ability to change date ranges for the above metrics on the fly as required.
- The dashboard should be designed so that it can be built upon and improved in future iterations and the data queries should be readable by other people.
- Use our company colour scheme and logo where it makes sense.
- We rely on your expertise to tell us what is required to make this work, but we are more than capable of procuring the required licenses, setting up the API access, etc. to ensure you have everything you need to create the data source connections and build the dashboard.

If this project is successful, we will have additional work and more dashboards for you to develop.

Hourly Range: $22.00-$54.00
Posted On: July 05, 2024 05:21 UTC
Category: Data Visualization
Skills:API Integration, Microsoft Power BI, Data Visualization, Data Analysis
Skills: API Integration, Microsoft Power BI, Data Visualization, Data Analysis
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Basic Demo Setup with Virtual Self-Service Agent - Upwork
item.description:
𝗧𝗶𝘁𝗹𝗲: Developer Needed for MS Teams Virtual Self-Service Agent Demo Setup

𝗗𝗲𝘀𝗰𝗿𝗶𝗽𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻:
We are seeking a skilled developer to set up a basic demo showcasing a virtual self-service agent within MS Teams. This demo will demonstrate the agent’s ability to handle conversational questions related to contract management.

𝗥𝗲𝘀𝗽𝗼𝗻𝘀𝗶𝗯𝗶𝗹𝗶𝘁𝗶𝗲𝘀:
Set Up SharePoint Server Subscription Edition
- Deploy SharePoint in Azure.
- Configure settings such as Subscription, Resource Group, Region (Canada East), SharePoint Farm Software Plan, etc.
- Integrate Active Directory for user authentication and permissions management.

𝗦𝘂𝗯𝘀𝗰𝗿𝗶𝗯𝗲 𝘁𝗼 𝗞𝗻𝗼𝘄𝗹𝗲𝗱𝗴𝗲𝗟𝗮𝗸𝗲 𝗜𝗻𝘁𝗲𝗹𝗹𝗶𝗴𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝗖𝗮𝗽𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲
- Integrate KnowledgeLake with SharePoint.
- Configure document capture workflows and OCR capabilities.

𝗣𝗿𝗲𝗽𝗮𝗿𝗲 𝗗𝗮𝘁𝗮 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝗔𝗻𝗮𝗹𝘆𝘀𝗶𝘀
- Organize contract data in SharePoint using metadata tagging.
- Ensure structured storage of relevant data.

𝗖𝗼𝗻𝗻𝗲𝗰𝘁 𝗣𝗼𝘄𝗲𝗿 𝗕𝗜 𝘁𝗼 𝗦𝗵𝗮𝗿𝗲𝗣𝗼𝗶𝗻𝘁
- Create a Power BI workspace for the project.
- Connect Power BI to SharePoint Online List or on-premises SharePoint List.

𝗕𝘂𝗶𝗹𝗱 𝗮 𝗕𝗮𝘀𝗶𝗰 𝗣𝗼𝘄𝗲𝗿 𝗕𝗜 𝗗𝗮𝘀𝗵𝗯𝗼𝗮𝗿𝗱
- Design a simple layout focusing on key contract metrics.
- Add visualizations such as bar charts, line charts, and KPIs.

𝗜𝗻𝘁𝗲𝗴𝗿𝗮𝘁𝗲 𝗗𝗮𝘀𝗵𝗯𝗼𝗮𝗿𝗱 𝗶𝗻 𝗠𝗦 𝗧𝗲𝗮𝗺𝘀
- Embed the dashboard in a specified MS Teams channel.

𝗦𝗲𝘁 𝗨𝗽 𝗩𝗶𝗿𝘁𝘂𝗮𝗹 𝗦𝗲𝗹𝗳-𝗦𝗲𝗿𝘃𝗶𝗰𝗲 𝗔𝗴𝗲𝗻𝘁
- Create a bot using Power Virtual Agents.
- Define intents and entities for common contract-related questions.
- Integrate the bot with SharePoint to access contract data.
- Deploy the bot in MS Teams and configure it to answer contract-related queries.

𝗥𝗲𝗾𝘂𝗶𝗿𝗲𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁𝘀:
- Proven experience with SharePoint, Power BI, MS Teams, and Power Virtual Agents.
- Understanding of data analysis, visualization, and automation workflows.
- Experience with Azure deployment and Active Directory integration.

item.title: SSIS and SSAS Specialist Needed for Retrospective Analysis  - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a highly skilled freelance specialist with extensive experience in SQL Server Integration Services (SSIS) and SQL Server Analysis Services (SSAS) to assist us in performing retrospective analysis. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in data integration, transformation, and analytics, with a proven track record of leveraging SSIS and SSAS to analyze historical data and generate actionable insights.

Responsibilities:

Data Integration and ETL (SSIS):

Extract data from various sources, including transactional databases, flat files, and web services.
Transform and clean data to ensure accuracy and consistency.
Load data into a centralized data warehouse for analysis.
Data Modeling and Analysis (SSAS):

Design and create OLAP cubes and tabular models for efficient data analysis.
Develop and implement data models that support retrospective analysis and reporting.
Explore and analyze historical data to identify trends, patterns, and anomalies.
Reporting and Visualization:

Collaborate with the team to define reporting requirements.
Create comprehensive reports and visualizations to present insights derived from retrospective analysis.
Provide recommendations based on data insights to support strategic decision-making.

Requirements:

Proven experience with SQL Server Integration Services (SSIS) and SQL Server Analysis Services (SSAS).
Strong understanding of ETL processes and data warehousing concepts.
Proficiency in designing and developing OLAP cubes and tabular models.
Experience with data analysis and visualization tools such as Power BI or Excel.
Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
Strong communication and collaboration skills.
Ability to work independently and manage time effectively.

Preferred Qualifications:

Previous experience in performing retrospective analysis using SSIS and SSAS.
Familiarity with additional SQL Server tools and technologies.

item.title: Training power bi - Upwork
item.description:
Hello, I work with Power BI. I have two tables: one table contains the names of asset groups (such as buildings, cars, furniture, etc.), and the other table is for asset transactions (assettrans). The asset transactions table has two columns: "transdate" for the transaction date and "transtype" for the type of transaction. The transaction types I have are 1, 2, 3, and 4, each representing a specific type of transaction linked to the table of transaction types' names. I want to calculate the opening balance for assets and depreciation, as shown in the image. I need to calculate the opening balance for assets and depreciation. The opening balance for assets should meet the condition that the transaction type is 1 or 2, and the opening balance for depreciation should have a transaction type of 3 or 4. How can I calculate the opening balances for each of them using DAX? I don't want to use the ready-made functions like OPENINGBALANCEYEAR or OPENINGBALANCEMONTH because the client wants to select a specific period, for example, from March 2022 to March 2023. Also, I don't think these built-in functions can handle this requirement. I appreciate your assistance. Thank you.

Hourly Range: $17.00-$50.00

item.title: Internal Dashboard Development using Power BI - Upwork
item.description:
Our company seeks a highly skilled and experienced agency or freelancer to develop a comprehensive internal dashboard using Microsoft Power BI. The aim of this project is to enhance our decision-making processes, improve operational efficiency, and provide actionable insights by consolidating various data sources into a unified, interactive, and user-friendly platform.

Objectives:
Data Integration: Aggregate data from multiple internal systems, including but not limited to sales, finance, operations, and human resources, into a single dashboard. The solution should facilitate seamless integration with our existing databases and ERP systems to ensure real-time data accuracy and availability.

Customization and Scalability: Develop a fully customizable dashboard that can evolve with our business needs. The dashboard should be scalable, allowing for the addition of new data sources and metrics without significant redesigns.

User-Friendly Interface: Create an intuitive and interactive user interface that enables users to easily navigate through the dashboard, filter data, and perform in-depth analyses. The design should cater to users with varying levels of technical expertise.

Visualization and Reporting: Implement advanced data visualization tools and techniques to present complex data in an easily digestible format. The dashboard should support the creation of various reports, including but not limited to performance metrics, trend analyses, and predictive insights.

Security and Access Control: Ensure the highest level of data security, including compliance with relevant data protection regulations. The system should include robust access control mechanisms, allowing for the customization of user access levels based on roles and responsibilities.

Training and Support: Provide comprehensive training to our team to ensure they are fully equipped to utilize the dashboard effectively. Additionally, offer ongoing technical support and maintenance services to address any issues and accommodate necessary updates.

Deliverables:
- A fully functional Power BI dashboard, integrated with our specified data sources.
- Documentation detailing the dashboard's architecture, data models, and integration processes.
- User manuals and training materials for end-users.
- A plan for ongoing maintenance and support services.

Timeline: We aim to complete this project within 3 to 6 months from the start date. However, we are open to discussions with the selected agency or freelancer to establish a realistic timeline that ensures quality and meets our business requirements.

We have the following view in a Database:
Events (id, classroom_id, planned_origin_id, graduate_course_id, grad_course_years[], event_start_timestamp, event_end_timestamp, origin_type, classroom_capacity, event_participants_count) which is composed by joining multiple relational tables.

overall percentage/hours of classroom occupation, keeping in mind any classroom is considered available from 8am to 13 and from 14:00 to 20:00

item.title: Machine Learning Engineer - Upwork
item.description:
Responsibilities:
- Design and develop machine learning algorithms, deep learning applications, and systems.
- Construct optimized data pipelines to feed machine learning models.
- Collaborate with product teams to define and refine machine learning projects that align with business goals.
- Develop and maintain scalable and robust machine learning models to drive user engagement and satisfaction.
- Utilize a variety of datasets to train and validate models, ensuring accuracy and efficiency in real-world applications.
- Implement advanced machine learning techniques, including supervised and unsupervised learning, deep learning, and anomaly detection.
- Optimize and troubleshoot the current recommendation system built on a graph database, ensuring it operates effectively and efficiently.
- Ensure seamless integration and data consistency between internal systems and the graph database.
- Work with the engineering team to deploy models into production, ensuring they operate at scale and with high reliability.
- Develop and implement monitoring tools and alerts for production models.
- Continuously evaluate and iterate on models based on performance metrics and feedback from users and stakeholders.
- Analyze data to extract insights and build data visualizations to support business intelligence and decision-making.
- Utilize data visualization libraries and BI tools to create dashboards and reports for various stakeholders.
- Collaborate with UX/UI teams to ensure machine learning features enhance user experience.
- Stay updated with the latest trends and advancements in AI and machine learning to bring innovation and improvements to our solutions.
- Work in short sprints on a POC/MVP basis and iterate models over time.

Qualifications/Skills:
- Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Data Science, or a related technical field.
- Proven experience in machine learning, data science, or a similar role.
- Strong proficiency in programming languages such as Python and frameworks/libraries like TensorFlow, PyTorch, and Scikit-Learn.
- Experience with graph databases, particularly TigerGraph, or a willingness to learn and adapt to it quickly.
- Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Google Cloud, Azure) and understanding of deploying applications at scale.
- Experience in integrating and ensuring data consistency between multiple systems.
- Experience working with UX/UI teams to implement machine learning features that enhance user experience.
- Strong analytical skills with the ability to collect, organize, analyze, and disseminate significant amounts of information with attention to detail and accuracy.
- Proven experience in developing monitoring tools and setting up alerts for production models.
- Ability to analyze complex data sets and provide actionable insights through data visualizations.
- Strong skills in data visualization tools and techniques, with experience using BI tools such as Tableau, Power BI, or - Looker to create dashboards and visual reports.
- Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to work in a fast-paced, startup environment.
- Extensive math and computer skills, with a deep understanding of probability, statistics, and algorithms.
- Familiarity with data structures, data modeling, and software architecture.
- Effective communication skills, both written and verbal, to collaborate with cross-functional teams.

Hourly Range: $20.00-$40.00

Category: Machine Learning
Skills:Python, Machine Learning, TensorFlow, Data Science, Artificial Intelligence, Deep Learning
Skills: Python, Machine Learning, TensorFlow, Data Science, Artificial Intelligence, Deep Learning

item.title: Data Analyst - Upwork
item.description:
About the role

As a Data Analyst you will provide quantitative insights, end-user and market and location understanding ti support Client’s business decision-making. As a data-loving member of the team, you serve as an analytics expert, using numbers to help make better decisions. You will weave stories with meaningful insight from data. You will also make critical recommendations for carbon emissions reductions and for nudging lower energy consumption by tenants. You are someone who has excellent communication skills and have a keen interest in real estate data. You will have prior experience in building well designed dashboards and workflows that can be readily meet the needs of business users.

Experience- 6+ years

Minimum qualifications
• Bachelor's degree in Statistics, Computer Science, Mathematics, Operations Research or similar
• Master's degree in a quantitative discipline (e.g., Statistics, Operations Research, Bioinformatics, Computer Science, Mathematics, Physics, Electrical Engineering, Industrial Engineering)
• Highly experienced with RDBMS, SQL, Big Query, Power BI
• Strong in Python for statistical or arithmetical analysis
• Strong experience in manipulating large data sets through statistical software (eg using Pivot Tables)
• Strong experience with large data sets, data reconciliation, and/or data investigation.
• Excellent communication skills in business English
• Experience in applying data analysis to solve business problems in complex, fast-moving, and ambiguous business environments.
• Proven project delivery and communication skills in cross functional teams.

Responsibilities
• You will work with multiple cross disciplinary teams to identify the problems to be solved and refine hypotheses to be tested. Being able to independently identify and scope out projects in collaboration with your colleagues and stakeholders from the tech and real estate teams is essential.
• You will manage development of data resources, gather requirements, organize sources, and support product launches.
• You will design and build metrics, code experiments into energy consumption and emissions data to spur teams to meet objectives, drive value for our occupiers and end-users
• This is a high impact, high responsibility role with a potential to have significant impact on the carbon footprint of the real estate sector


Posted On: July 04, 2024 09:29 UTC
Category: Data Analytics
Skills:Microsoft Power BI, BigQuery, Tableau, Python, SQL

item.title: Data Engineer / Data Scientist - Upwork
item.description:
### About the Role
We are seeking a talented and motivated Data Engineer to join our dynamic team. As a Data Engineer, you will have chances to work with great US companies.

### Key Responsibilities
- Design and Implement Data Pipelines: Develop and manage robust ETL processes to collect, clean, and process large volumes of data from various sources.
- Data Warehousing: Design and maintain data warehouse architectures that support business intelligence and analytics needs.
- Data Integration: Integrate data from different sources, ensuring data consistency and quality.
Database Management: Maintain and optimize databases to ensure high performance and reliability.
- Collaboration: Work closely with data scientists, analysts, and other stakeholders to understand data requirements and deliver solutions.
- Monitoring and Maintenance: Monitor data pipelines and systems to ensure data integrity and performance. Troubleshoot and resolve issues as they arise.
- Documentation: Document data processes, architectures, and pipelines to ensure clarity and maintainability.
Technical Skills Required
- Programming Languages: Proficiency in languages such as Python, Java, or Scala.
- Database Technologies: Strong experience with SQL and NoSQL databases, such as PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, Cassandra, etc.
- ETL Tools: Experience with ETL tools and frameworks such as Apache Airflow, Talend, or Informatica.
- Big Data Technologies: Familiarity with big data technologies like Hadoop, Spark, Kafka, etc.
- Cloud Platforms: Experience with cloud services (AWS, GCP, Azure) for data storage, processing, and management (e.g., Redshift, BigQuery, Dataflow).
- Data Modeling: Strong understanding of data modeling principles and techniques.
- APIs and Data Integration: Knowledge of RESTful APIs and experience with data integration tools and techniques.
- Version Control: Experience with version control systems such as Git.
- Data Visualization: Basic understanding of data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI) is a plus.
- Security and Compliance: Awareness of data security best practices and compliance requirements.

### Qualifications
- Education: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
- Experience: Minimum of 3 years of experience in data engineering or a related role.
- Communication: Excellent communication skills to collaborate effectively with technical and non-technical stakeholders.
- Adaptability: Ability to work in a fast-paced, dynamic environment and adapt to changing requirements.

Hourly Range: $15.00-$25.00

item.title: Freelance Dashboard Specialist - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description:

We are looking for a skilled specialist to create a comprehensive and visually appealing dashboard. The dashboard will be used to display trends and revenue data in various charts, helping us analyze and visualize our financial performance effectively. The platform for the dashboard can be any tool that best suits the requirements, such as Excel, Tableau, Power BI, Google Data Studio, etc.

Responsibilities:

Design and create a dashboard to display key metrics related to trends and revenues.
Develop various types of charts and graphs (e.g., line charts, bar charts, pie charts) to represent data visually.
Ensure the dashboard is user-friendly, interactive, and easy to update with new data.
Incorporate dynamic features such as filters and drop-down lists for easy data manipulation.
Collaborate with our team to understand specific requirements and make adjustments as needed.
Requirements:

Proven experience in creating advanced dashboards on platforms like Excel, Tableau, Power BI, Google Data Studio, or similar.
Proficiency in data visualization techniques and tools.
Strong analytical skills and attention to detail.
Ability to communicate effectively and understand project requirements.
Experience with financial data is a plus.
Preferred Qualifications:

Experience with multiple dashboard platforms.
Previous work on similar projects, especially in the financial sector.
Deliverables:

A fully functional and interactive dashboard.
Clear instructions on how to update and maintain the dashboard.
Any necessary documentation or user guides.
Application Instructions:

Please submit your proposal along with:

A brief cover letter explaining your relevant experience.
Examples of previous dashboards you have created.
Your estimated time for completion and your rate.
We look forward to working with a talented professional who can deliver a high-quality dashboard to help us make informed business decisions.

Hourly Range: $20.00-$30.00
Posted On: July 04, 2024 07:47 UTC
Category: Data Visualization
Skills:Dashboard, Data Visualization, Google Analytics, Microsoft Excel
Skills: Dashboard, Data Visualization, Google Analytics, Microsoft Excel
Country: United Arab Emirates

item.description:
We are seeking a talented and experienced professional who can create high-quality board level presentations with expertise in financial data presentation. Responsibilities:
- Develop visually appealing board level presentations that effectively communicate financial data
- Collaborate with internal stakeholders to gather requirements and understand the presentation objectives
- Analyze financial data and identify key insights to be included in the presentations
- Create compelling charts, graphs, and visual representations of financial data

item.title: Data Engineering Architect - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description
About Vinz Global:

Vinz Global is a leading innovator in the technology industry, providing cutting-edge solutions to clients across the globe. Our mission is to deliver exceptional value through advanced technology and superior service. We are seeking a dynamic and experienced Technical Project Manager to join our team and lead our product development initiatives.

This is a Work From Office Position.
Location: Baner, Pune


Lead data engineering projects to build and operationalize data solutions for business using Azure services in combination with custom solutions - Azure Data Factory, Azure Data Flows, Azure Databricks, Azure Data Lake Gen 2, Azure SQL etc
Act as technical and data SME/Analyst of the process and systems, and work with business to ensure requirements (Run and Change) are understood by the service teams Experience in migrating on-premise data warehouses to Databricks
Designing and implementing data engineering, ingestion and transformation functions using ADF, Databricks
Proficient in Py-Spark
Experience in building Python based APIs on Azure Function Apps
Experience on Azure Logic apps
Experience in Lakehouse/Datawarehouse implementation using modern data platform architecture
Capacity Planning and Performance Tuning on ADF & Databricks pipelines
Support data visualization development using Power BI
Exposure across all the SDLC process, including testing and deployment
Experience in relational and dimensional modelling, including big data technologies
Experience in  DevOps - Build CI/CD pipelines for ADF, ADLS, Databricks, Azure SQL DB etc
Experience of working in secured Azure environments using Azure KeyVaults, Service Principals, and Managed Identities
Good to have knowledge on Apigee (Googles API Management)
Understanding of data masking, encryption and other practices used in handling sensitive data
Ability to interact with Business for requirement gathering and query resolutions
Working on on-shore based client teams, collaborating within a team environment and participating in typical project lifecycle activities such as requirement analysis, testing and release
Develop Azure Data skills within the team through knowledge sharing sessions, articles, etc.
Adherence to organisations Risk & Controls requirements
Advise Educate clients on how to use different distributed storage computing technologies from the plethora of options available
Develop and operate modern data architecture approaches to meet key business objectives provide end-to-end data solutions



Posted On: July 04, 2024 04:51 UTC
Category: Data Engineering
Skills:Database Architecture, PySpark, Databricks Platform, CI/CD
Skills: Database Architecture, PySpark, Databricks Platform, CI/CD
Country: India
click to apply
